name: Fly Destroyer
description: Do you hate flies? Then this game is for you! Flies .. they are everywhere! Arm yourself and destroy them all!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64) Processor: Intel I5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equavalent Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (x64) Processor: Intel I5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 Storage: 900 MB available space
